short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Boost your Productivity with Boom! Summarize chats, email meetings, and get message suggestions. Powered by GPT

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Boom will enhance your WhatsApp experience! It will help you summarize conversations, send meeting summaries to your email, and even suggest messages for you to send. If you install our extension, you'll see three beautiful buttons on WhatsApp Web.

Actually, it can help you summarize content from anywhere on the web and send you summaries and meeting invitations via email. You just have to select any text in Chrome and click on our Boom menu items.

We don't save any of your personal data, and we're here to put generative AI power at your disposal!
